nodes.text: Palola, also known as Palo, was a Lorrdian male and a sergeant of the Galactic Republic's Ereesus Planetary Security Forces during the Clone Wars.

During a battle on Ereesus, Sergeant Palola's squad was captured by the Confederacy of Independent Systems. However, Palola and his men were rescued by a team led by Clone Captain CT-7567 and Lieutenant Sollaw ap-Orwien.
